VAF_cutoff1	0.05	misc VAF threshold
VAF_cutoff	0.002	minimum VAF to be considered present in a sample
VAF_ignore	0.2	ignore ambiguous variant fall below this cutoff
pcomm_cutoff	0.1	localPcomm_cutoff
p.val_cutoff	0.05	fish exact test p-val cutoff for multi source cases
num_round_digit	3	number of decimal to be rounded off
center_cutoff	0.5	samePatient_cutoff
source_cutoff	0.4	source_cutoff
target_cutoff	0.1	target_cutoff
region_cutoff	0.75	for globalPcomm <pcomm_cutoff, sourceLarge_cutoff
n_sample	7	number of sample
